ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
Sentinelsat makes searching, downloading and retrieving the metadata
of Sentinel satellite images from the Copernicus Open Access Hub easy.
It offers an easy-to-use command line interface and a powerful Python API.
about.summary: Search and download Copernicus Sentinel satellite images

about.description:
Sentinelsat makes searching, downloading and retrieving the metadata
of Sentinel satellite images from the Copernicus Open Access Hub easy.
It offers an easy-to-use command line interface and a powerful Python API.
about.summary: Search and download Copernicus Sentinel satellite images

name: sentinelsat
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "sentinelsat" %}
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d38de0ae1e167d7311426973b0207380e9fa1c4a6f5353dc58bd83bf88b5db4d

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  entry_points:
    - sentinelsat = sentinelsat.scripts.cli:cli

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - requests
    - click
    - html2text
    - geojson >=2
    - tqdm
    - six
    - geomet

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - sentinelsat
  commands:
    - sentinelsat --help
  #   - python -m pytest --pyargs sentinelsat
  # requires:
  #   - pandas
  #   - geopandas
  #   - shapely
  #   - pytest >=3.6.3
  #   - pytest-vcr      # not in conda-forge
  #   - pytest-socket
  #   - requests-mock
  #   - pyyaml
  #   - rstcheck
  # source_files:
  #   - tests

about:
  home: https://github.com/sentinelsat/sentinelsat
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Search and download Copernicus Sentinel satellite images
  description: |
    Sentinelsat makes searching, downloading and retrieving the metadata
    of Sentinel satellite images from the Copernicus Open Access Hub easy.
    It offers an easy-to-use command line interface and a powerful Python API.
  doc_url: https://sentinelsat.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/sentinelsat/sentinelsat

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - avalentino
